course_title: Concepts and Methods in Cultural Anthropology
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 28 / Seats Avail: 9Waitlist Total: 0 of 6
course_description: Basic concepts and theories of cultural anthropology. Comparative economic and political systems, social organization and the family, belief systems, and modes of communication. Diverse levels of sociocultural complexity from tribal to industrial societies.
